name: Teeter Slope Puzzle
description:
Teeter Slope puzzle is a classic fun brain teaser tilt game (no arcade elements).

Your objective is a put all green balls to the black hole. If you put gray ball to hole you lose. Click on the border of board to tilt the board and balls are moving. Ball stop on the wall. If you want, you can use the accelerometer (tilt your phone or tablet).

Game features:
- great graphics
- 45 challenges
- 5 difficulty levels
- great and fun gameplay
- user friendly & intuitive interface
- autosave feature

Have fun!
